Sentencas: Cu-ceria cermets have been widely investigated as the anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) that operated with hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the anode reaction processes are not clear yet, especially those at the ceria-Cu-gas three phase boundary (3 PB).
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work investigates samaria-doped ceria (SDC)-Cu-gas 3 PB reaction kinetics for the oxidation of H-2 and CO, the products from hydrocarbons via external and internal reforming.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical conductivity relaxation measurement demonstrates that Cu is a synergistic catalyst that can significantly increase the reaction rate.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reaction at 3 PB contributes 813/66.8% of H-2/CO oxidation when 5.4% SDC surface is covered with Cu particles.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Combining with AC impedance analysis, elementary steps are proposed for the reaction at 3 PB.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Water vapor combining to oxygen vacancy and carbon monoxide transforming to carbonate are the rate determining steps for the oxidation of H-2 and CO, respectively.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Cu-SDC has shown much higher catalytic activity, i.e. about fivefold reaction rate, for the oxidation of CO than H-2.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, Cu-SDC electrodes exhibit lower interfacial polarization resistance and lower activation energy for the electrochemical oxidation of CO than H-2.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Consequently, CO is easier to be oxidized than H-2 when the Cuceria anode is fueled with syngas, the reforming product from hydrocarbons.
Titulo: H2 and CO oxidation process at the three-phase boundary of Cu-ceria cermet anode for solid oxide fuel cell
